description.narrative:
The GPA has put in place a three-year strategic advocacy plan which is approved in 2019. However, its effective implementation requires that all partners be informed of it and agree to support technically and financially its implementation. So, FOPABU proposed toorganize a ceremony for its official launch in the form of a business meeting to which the partners will be invited.
Objective: Present to the partners and launch the GPA advocacy strategic plan and receive their commitment to support the planned activities.
Beneficiaries: 30 representatives of GPA member organizations and 10 representatives of technical and financial partners.
Result: TheGPA's advocacy strategic plan is launched and the partners commit to supporting GPA in its advocacy efforts for the benefit of peasant agricultural producers.
